name: JavaScript: The Good Parts
description: A comprehensive guide to JavaScript best practices and patterns. Learn the beautiful, elegant, lightweight and highly expressive language known as JavaScript.

name: Clean Code
description: A Handbook of Agile Software Craftsmanship by Robert C. Martin. Learn how to write clean, maintainable code.

name: Wireless Gaming Mouse
description: Ergonomic wireless gaming mouse with RGB lighting, 6 programmable buttons, and 2.4GHz connection. DPI up to 16000.

name: Mechanical Keyboard
description: RGB mechanical gaming keyboard with Cherry MX Blue switches. Full-size layout with dedicated media keys and USB passthrough.

name: USB-C Hub
description: 7-in-1 USB-C hub with HDMI, USB 3.0 ports, SD card reader, and 100W power delivery. Compatible with MacBook and Windows laptops.

name: Cotton T-Shirt
description: 100% organic cotton t-shirt, available in multiple colors. Comfortable, breathable, and eco-friendly. Unisex fit.

name: Denim Jeans
description: Classic straight-fit denim jeans. Premium quality fabric with stretch for comfort. Available in various sizes and washes.

name: Winter Hoodie
description: Warm and cozy winter hoodie with fleece lining. Features kangaroo pocket and adjustable drawstring hood.

name: Laptop Stand
description: Adjustable aluminum laptop stand with ergonomic design. Improves posture and cooling. Fits laptops up to 17 inches.

name: Bluetooth Headphones
description: Wireless over-ear headphones with active noise cancellation. 30-hour battery life, premium sound quality, and comfortable design.

name: Programming Socks
description: Comfortable cotton socks perfect for long coding sessions. Fun programming-themed designs. Pack of 3 pairs.

name: The Pragmatic Programmer
description: Your Journey To Mastery by Andrew Hunt and David Thomas. A classic guide to software craftsmanship and professional development.

name: Design Patterns Book
description: Elements of Reusable Object-Oriented Software. The Gang of Four classic on software design patterns.

name: Spiral Notebook A5
description: A5 spiral-bound notebook with 200 lined pages. Perfect for notes, journaling, or sketching. Durable cover.

name: Desk Organizer
description: Bamboo desk organizer with multiple compartments for pens, papers, and office supplies. Eco-friendly and stylish.

name: LED Desk Lamp
description: Adjustable LED desk lamp with touch control and 3 brightness levels. Eye-caring light for reading and working. USB charging port included.

name: Webcam 1080p
description: Full HD 1080p webcam with built-in microphone. Auto-focus and low-light correction. Perfect for video calls and streaming.

name: Backpack
description: Water-resistant laptop backpack with USB charging port. Fits laptops up to 15.6 inches. Multiple compartments for organization.

name: You Don't Know JS
description: Book series by Kyle Simpson diving deep into JavaScript mechanics. Essential reading for serious JavaScript developers.

name: Rubber Duck
description: Classic yellow rubber duck for rubber duck debugging. An essential tool for every programmer's desk!
